section.heading: Rediscover the Sunny Side
section.lead: With all but two months of 2020 behind us, it goes without saying brighter days are undoubtedly ahead. After months spent indoors, vacations put on hold, and a surplus of stress and anxiety, what could be better than a trip somewhere warm with sun rays beaming down?
section.body: Whether you’re looking for a long weekend getaway this coming holiday season, seeking a warm escape this winter, or simply planning ahead for your summer 2021 family vacation, the “sunny side” awaits you. Are you ready to get back out there? Are you ready to turn off your phone and forget, for just a moment, reality? It’s time – to put a smile on your face once again. It’s time to reconnect with your loved ones or, perhaps, with yourself. It’s time to relax, rejuvenate, and destress. It’s time to heal from everything this past year has brought. It’s time to feel like you once again. It’s time to rediscover the brighter and sunnier side of life.
